Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima's crimson optics glowed & narrowed. She had to pick this battle 
carefully.

"Remove yourselves from the area!" she demanded. "I'm willing to talk to 
Rodimus Prime to .. settle this arrangement!" 

Her optics went to Kup. "I'll speak with you, Kup! ONLY if the others back 
off! I don't want this place destroyed as much as you!" 

With this she made her way, leaping, down to the ground then waltzing up 
towards Kup. Her optics caught sight of Convoy as well. This intregued her.. she 
hadn't seen this one before. Then her crimson optics glared at Empath. Empath 
was making another wrong impression with her. 

She then turned her optics on Kup as she stepped up to him. "I don't wish to 
do anything with the inhabitants inside. I'm merely protecting them." Pausing. 
"Even though as much as I loathe your Autobot companions in stasis, my 
intentions are true & pure. I only want those inside to remain untouched.. & 
unharmed." Another pause. "I'll be willing to give my life for them. I'm placing my 
very existance on the line here, Kup. If Rodimus still sees a problem with 
that, then he can come to face me."

"As to the others here, I believe that the Ark should have no inhabitants, 
but I will regularly return here. I have the Ark & Teletran 1 wired to notify me 
of intruders as well as Defenses armed & ready when anyone other than I are 
nearby. Hence, why you were fired upon. If you don't like that... then... the 
Ark can suffer in the future." Her voice so serious. However, she was SO bound &
 determined to have this her way. There was one reason as to why. & he was 
inside the Ark. 

Her crimson optics gazed at Kup, awaiting his response.

--part1_42.39210b70.2c0e6868_boundary
